revised_title: Further Observations on the Organisation of Fossil Plants of Coal Measures: Lyginodendron and Heterangium
tldr: This article investigates the organization and structure of the fossil plants Lyginodendron and Heterangium from the coal measures. The authors provide detailed descriptions of the stem, vascular bundles, secondary tissues, pith, pericycle, cortex, and leaves of these plants, as well as discussing their similarities to existing cycads and ferns.
